# AnimationEvents.PlaybackCompleted

**Structure**

The event raised when an animation reaches the end of its duration.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PlaybackCompleted
```

## Overview

This event isn’t triggered if you call the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationPlaybackController/stop()] method on a playback controller.

## Getting the controller

- **playbackController**: The animation playback controller managing the animation that triggered the event.

## Recognizing animation events

- **AnimationEvents.PlaybackStarted**: The event raised when an animation has been started.
- **AnimationEvents.PlaybackLooped**: The event raised when an animation loops.
- **AnimationEvents.PlaybackTerminated**: The event raised when an animation has been terminated, regardless of whether it ran to completion.

## Conforms To

- Event
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
